nodes.name: TokenDestructible
destroy
TokenDestructible
destroy

devdoc.author: Remco Bloemen <remco@2π.com>
devdoc.details: Base contract that can be destroyed by owner. All funds in contract including listed tokens will be sent to the owner.

params.tokens: List of addresses of ERC20 or ERC20Basic token contracts to refund.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

devdoc.title: TokenDestructible:

destroy(address[]).notice: Terminate contract and refund to ownerThe called token contracts could try to re-enter this contract. Only supply token contracts you trust.
